The user melts pieces of their armour, creating a black liquid that they can freely manipulate. The material itself is durable enough that it isn't easily pierced and, in its liquid form, can be used to encase the target and trap their body.<ref name="Mitsuki Gaiden">''Naruto Gaiden: The Road Illuminated by the Full Moon'', page 25</ref>
